metadata.name: Norwegian Romance
metadata.description:
I stumbled across this beautiful scene while showing my friend from São Paulo around the southern regions of Norway. We drove up and down the county of Telemark for 10 hours, and was presented with this gorgeous scene that stopped us in our tracks. A slow river with wild salmon jumping right in front of our eyes, with a majestic backdrop. 

Undoubtedly one of my all time favorite images that I have ever created, and a perfect representation of the Norwegian countryside, where I grew up.

This  photograph is an ode to the paintings from the romantic period, and is inspired by "Brudeferd i Hardanger" by Hans Gude & Adolph Tidemand.


‘Norwegian Romance’ is a limited edition by Ole Haugland

Title: Norwegian Romance  
Artist: Ole Haugland (hauglandphoto)  
Edition: 30 | 30  
Price: 0.030Ξ  
Date: 30.07.2017  
Location: Telemark, Norway

The image will never be replicated as a 1/1, in a collection, as a composite, or in any form of digital art.
